      • run

        public static void run(Datacore dc,
                       java.lang.String username,
                       java.lang.String password)
                throws javax.security.auth.login.LoginException,
                       java.io.IOException
        Load the requested user from the "users.ser" file and send login handshakes to every ip in the "config.properties" file.
        Parameters:
        username - Username of the requested user
        password - Password of the requested user
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - When the users file or config file can't be read
        javax.security.auth.login.LoginException - When the user can't be found

      • run

        public static void run(Datacore dc,
                       LocalUser user)
                throws java.io.IOException
        Log the given user in and send login handshakes to every ip in the "config.properties" file. This method should be called after an account creation.
        Parameters:
        user - The local user that is logging in
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - When the config file can't be read
